snippet: For the first time, the public heard Omar Mateen talking with the authorities amid his assault on the gay nightclub Pulse....
lead_paragraph: For the first time, the public heard Omar Mateen talking with the authorities amid his assault on the gay nightclub Pulse.
abstract: City of Orlando releases recordings of 911 call made by Omar Mateen, man responsible for massacre at Orlando, Fla, nightclub Pulse in June; tapes reveal Mateen declared his allegiance to Islamic State group and criticized American airstrikes in Middle East.

headline.main: 911 Recordings of Gunman During Orlando Nightclub Siege Are Released
headline.print_headline: Tapes Released of Gunman  During Orlando Rampage

byline.contributor: Les Neuhaus reported from Orlando, and Alan Blinder from Atlanta. Rukmini Callimachi contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By LES NEUHAUS and ALAN BLINDER
